feed.subtitle: I am a developer, photography enthusiast, and self-proclaimed music connoisseur.This is where I write about awesome things that intrigue me.

entry.title: Reads on RethinkDB
entry.content:
RethinkDB is a open source realtime nosql database like Mongo but packed with several interesting features like changefeeds,realtime updates etc.

Posts that I find useful for learning and while implementing rethinkdb in different projects.

Query RethinkDB tables from PostgreSQL with foreign data wrappers
